column4: if Flywater is using 12.04 please don't offer support here (other then directing them to the proper channel, #ubuntu+1)
comeon... This is 'ubuntu' basics and not release related...
doesn't matter... if you use alpha/beta the proper channel for support is #ubuntu+1 - this channel would be filled with beta support requests if it where allowed
I can accept that point of view ... ;)
